item.title: Donna Summer - Hot Stuff
item.description:
Sittin’ here
eatin’ my heart out
Waitin’ waitin’ for
some lover to call
Dialed about
a thousand numbers
Lately
almost rang the phone
Off the wall
lookin’ for
Some hot stuff
baby this evenin’
I need some hot stuff
baby tonight-

some hot stuff

tonight-

who needs another

with
